official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide medicare coverage of wigs and hairpieces for individuals with alopecia that resulted from treatment of malignant disease.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage for wigs and hairpieces needed due to alopecia that resulted from treatment of a malignant disease.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide medicare coverage of wigs and hairpieces for individuals with alopecia that resulted from treatment of malignant disease.
